column4: wen i watch a video in full screen on vlc, the whole thing jus starts dimming until a certain point and stays like that, the brightness gets restored once i get back to window mode.
wen i watch a video in full screen on vlc, the whole thing jus starts dimming until a certain point and stays like that, the brightness gets restored once i get back to window mode. vlc player, 10.04

wen i watch a video in full screen on vlc, the whole thing jus starts dimming until a certain point and stays like that, the brightness gets restored once i get back to window mode. vlc player, 10.04. how do i fix it? this didn't happen earlier
it starts dimming from the start of video playback? or after in the movie part way?
wenever i go to full screen
and it stays dim, not complete black
sounds almost like a power saveing setting kicking in..
my comp jus woke up from a monitor power saver setting about 15 mins back
perhaps check out the settings in the powersaver tool/gui.  theres be3en some bugs with powersaveing
it would be a interesting test if it did it with any other players or just vlc.. if it did it in vlc with other desktops/window managers also.
there is a 'dim on inactive' setting i thought. That slmost sounds like thats kicking in.
Jus checked it out, totem seems to act the same
Played with the settings, no go, gonna log out and log back in (the session i mean) . See if that works
wen i restarted xserver it didn't solve the dimming issue
but a restart of the whole system seemed to do the trick
The full restart was the big hammer :P
